text: Ra juna byaktile tiniharubata yasa avasarama pithyu pharka'unecha,– tara yadi usale yud'dhacalako rupama va arko tukadisamga sarana lina a'umcha– tyo arkai kura ho. Bamki aru jasale yasto garnecha, tyo allahako krodhama parnecha. Ra tyasako basasthana narka hunecha ra tyo sahrai naramro tha'um ho
